actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: a bill to amend the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure with respect to the examination of prospective jurors.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure to revise certain guidelines with respect to the examination of prospective jurors. Requires the court to permit the plaintiff and defendant or their attorneys each at least 30 minutes to conduct an oral examination of the prospective jury.

titles.title: a bill to amend the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure with respect to the examination of prospective jurors.
